channel.title: MonTransit
channel.description: Latest news about the MonTransit app

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: always show times⌚ in local📍 time-zone instead of device📱 time-zone, 163 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: making it easier & faster🚄 to add new🆕 transit agencies (WIP)🔄, 271 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: improvements to latest news📰 loading and text search🔍 user interface, 154 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: fixed bug🐛 with Edge-to-Edge UI on Android 7-10, 131 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: bug fixes & performance improvements, 218 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: full compatibility with Android 15 Vanilla Ice Cream🍦 including Edge-to-Edge↕️ UI✨, news📰 video📺 player, 217 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: added real-time🛰️ service alerts⚠️ℹ️ to GO Transit 🚍🚆 & UP Express🚆, news📰 to BC Transit🚍, 145 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: initial compatibility with Android 15 Vanilla Ice Cream🍦, 173 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: new dots UI 🟦🟥🟩⬜ for bike🚲 stations availability, less⬇️ annoying😖 "new schedule available" prompts💬, 198 schedule updates🔁…

item.title: Last Month in MonTransit
item.description: reached 1M+ downloads⬇️ on Google Play Store!💚, better nearby🎯 connections🔀 in stop/station screen #UserRequest, improved real time🛰️ service alerts severityℹ️⚠️ and data updates reliability🦾, 252 service updates🔁…
